SELECT o.uid, o.btitle, o.bcontent, o.bdate, o.commentYN,o.bdel FROM onlineview o join user u on o.uid = u.uid WHERE o.uid = (select uid from user where uid = #{uid}) ORDER BY o.bdate DESC;
